central_purchase.title: Central purchasing
central_purchase.description:
ZEROUAL LABORATORIES is a purchasing center specialized in medical industries present in Africa.

Being located as close as possible to our customers, our promise is to address all the questions posed by a project in terms of supply and Supply Chain in order to provide, in all circumstances, a response adapted to the needs of medical laboratories, clinics, hospitals etc.
